task.name: Get Some Sleep Dr. Gray
task.description: There is this thing called a bed. It is your friend.

task.name: Squatting sasquatches squat by a tree.
task.description: There is a tree in the field by a fence.

task.name: We like our app.
task.description: No matter how primitive it looks. Believe us it wasn't simple. Just look at the website Brittany did.
